member.summary: This exception is shown whenever a project with a given id does not exist or if the user has insufficient rights to access it.

member.summary: This exception is shown whenever a project with invalid name is referenced

member.summary: This exception is shown when a project with the given name already exists.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Core.WebApi.ProjectWorkPendingException
member.summary: This exception is shown whenever a project operation cannot be performed due to work queue operations pending For example if project 'foo' was renamed to 'bar' but this update has not yet been processed by all Tfs components then renaming a project into 'foo' would be blocked (though technically name 'foo' is not occupied by any projects)

members.member: Returns a localized string given a resource string name.
Returns a localized integer given a resource string name.
Returns a localized string given a resource string name.

A little helper function to alleviate some typing associated with loading resources and formatting the strings. In DEBUG builds, it also asserts that the number of format arguments and the length of args match.
